ctx: intros F FF f g c Hex Hfg.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f, g : T -> V c : K Hex : exists y : K, mult y c = one Hfg : forall eps : posreal, F (fun x : T => norm (minus (g x) (f x)) <= eps * norm (g x)) eps : posreal The term "0" has type "R" while it is expected to have type "T".

original: intros F FF f g c Hex Hfg. unfold is_equiv in Hfg. unfold is_domin in Hfg. intros eps. apply Hfg with (eps * norm (f 0)). auto.
